A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overly silly\, stupid dialogue\, plot made no sense. I am angry that this script was approved and horrified that this movie even exists. I cringed so much during this movie.. At one point I just had to look away. Is possible to return this movie? Can we give it back to Disney and say \"nope. You have to redo this.\"? This movie is is just further proof that 2017 HAS BEEN THE WORST YEAR EVER!
